text: Sorting a string in array, making it sparsely populated
For example, say I have string like:

code: duck duck duck duck goose goose goose dog

text: And I want it to be as sparsely populated as possible, say in this case

code: duck goose duck goose dog duck goose duck

text: What sort of algorithm would you recommend?
Snippets of code or general pointers would be useful, languages welcome Python, C++ and extra kudos if you have a way to do it in bash.
